The staff were very friendly and helpful, which made our stay more memorable. Food option for breakfast wasnâ€™t plentiful but taste and presentation was good.

review_pos: Breakfast were of limited choices. Booked for maiin course for 6, yet only got 5 , when complained the waitress kept checking & counting instead of apologizing & promptly prepared the missing main course.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Everything was amazing! Even before we arrived, Aaron had reached out to help organise a complimentary airport transfer which was so appreciated. We were celebrating our anniversary and were surprised with a cake on our first night. Our housekeep Jack made really cute towel animals everyday. Complimentary buggy to the beach was very nice! Evening canapÃ©s were the best, 1904 spritz and French 75 were favourites! We also received a free bottle of champagne on our last night which was so unexpected and lovely. Aaron even helped toorganise a car for us to get to our next hotel when we checked out which was so great! Every staff member we met was so lovely and really had personalized service. We didnâ€™t manage to grab everyoneâ€™s name but would want to thank everyone for making our stay so enjoyable! Definitely will be returning!!! p.s. the pool access rooms were amazing!
review_neg: Would like a full length mirror in the room.

Evening canapÃ©s were the best, 1904 spritz and French 75 were favourites! We also received a free bottle of champagne on our last night which was so unexpected and lovely. Aaron even helped toorganise a car for us to get to our next hotel when we checked out which was so great! Every staff member we met was so lovely and really had personalized service. Would like a full length mirror in the room.

review_pos: Ease of access to Vivo City. Monorail close at hand to visit all Sentosa has to offer.A few good restaurants in walking distance.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: I love everything it is to it! From the rooms (albeit a little too small) the service staff and the package tied to my booking, especially the free flow alcohol with the canapÃ¨s! Special kudos to the team, in particular, Emily and Jia Ming, who made my partner and I feel so at home and welcomed. The food was good; the drinks were exceptional! Haha! I loved the jacuzzi too! Thank you once again for that lovely experience! I would be coming back again!Ina & Mr Peng

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Everything about the hotel was great. The staff were exception and really took the time to get to know our family and their needs. The food provided was outstanding. The facilities are exceptional and private, it really feels like you are on an exclusive island resort. Loved the buggy service down to the beach, made it easy to get there and back with a toddler.
review_neg: The food portions were very large and we couldn't finish everything.
review_text: Everything about the hotel was great. The staff were exception and really took the time to get to know our family and their needs. The food provided was outstanding. The facilities are exceptional and private, it really feels like you are on an exclusive island resort. Loved the buggy service down to the beach, made it easy to get there and back with a toddler. The food portions were very large and we couldn't finish everything.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The hotel had excellent crowd control in view of the COVID situation. The service from the hotel staff were impeccable. The hotel really pampers the guest with luxurious toiletries which smells amazing. The complimentary 5-8pm evening cocktail hours were splendid.
review_neg: The mosquitos and moth which flew into the room. Was disappointed that the afternoon tea time was chargeable and not complimentary given the exorbitant room rate charged at such premium price.
review_text: The hotel had excellent crowd control in view of the COVID situation. The service from the hotel staff were impeccable. The hotel really pampers the guest with luxurious toiletries which smells amazing. The complimentary 5-8pm evening cocktail hours were splendid. The mosquitos and moth which flew into the room. Was disappointed that the afternoon tea time was chargeable and not complimentary given the exorbitant room rate charged at such premium price.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Excellent service staff (Gavin & Mark). Very attentive and helpful. One of the best service I've seen at our local hotels.
review_neg: A bit pricey. But I guess you're paying for the classy hotel and exclusivity.
review_text: Excellent service staff (Gavin & Mark). Very attentive and helpful. One of the best service I've seen at our local hotels. A bit pricey. But I guess you're paying for the classy hotel and exclusivity.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Everything was great. Room was beautiful & cozy. Staff were all lovely. I appreciate they did some free cocktail appetizer in the evening with free flow of alcoholic drinks.
review_neg: It costs a bomb. It was more than 1000SGD. At that price I usually buy a long flight ticket. But due to covid, no choice but staycation only this year... The breakfast was a bit small. For the price I was expecting more. When I compare with W Hotel for example, there you have a all-you-can-eat huge breakfast with tons of choices.
review_text: Everything was great. Room was beautiful & cozy. Staff were all lovely. I appreciate they did some free cocktail appetizer in the evening with free flow of alcoholic drinks. It costs a bomb. It was more than 1000SGD. At that price I usually buy a long flight ticket. But due to covid, no choice but staycation only this year... The breakfast was a bit small. For the price I was expecting more. When I compare with W Hotel for example, there you have a all-you-can-eat huge breakfast with tons of choices.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The staff is very polite and very attentive. For those who had met me previously (check in or restaurant seating or to obtain parking coupons) actually remember my name and addressed me by Mr Xxx. Which is a nice touch. Small boutique hotel. Many local families with children the same age as my son and they had a blast in the pool.
review_neg: I think for couples or guests without kids, this place might be too noisy for them. The pool is right next to their rooms.

For those who had met me previously (check in or restaurant seating or to obtain parking coupons) actually remember my name and addressed me by Mr Xxx. Which is a nice touch. Small boutique hotel. review_pos: Hotel staff were amazing and attentive. Nice pool, delicious breakfast for adults and kids. We enjoyed the evening cocktails and canapes. Room was comfortable and spacious. We certainly hope to come back again.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The hotel is stunning. I love the old colonial building. The rooms have been beautifully renovated, and all rooms have views over the pool. I had a really relaxing stay. I didnâ€™t realise breakfast and evening canapÃ©s were included, so that was a nice surprise! The best part about my stay was the amazing service each of the staff members provided. Everyone went above and beyond to make sure I had a great experience. Canâ€™t wait to come back!!

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The hotel is absolutely gorgeous. We booked the premium room with direct  pool access and it was paradise with our own little jacuzzi and terrasse. The room was beautiful with a great colonial style! Bed was super comfy, amazing bathtub, shower, Japanese toilet, decoration etc! Staff was extremely accommodating and nice! We loved the evening cocktails and canapÃ©s complementary every night: delicious! Breakfast was also super good! The welcome drink was superb  and original. Two nights and we felt so relaxed when we left!
review_neg: We went for our wedding anniversary and I was told that a cake would help us celebrate; we did not get it but got a lovely bottle of prosecco so this was ok! The little history tour could be a bit more detailed but it was interesting!
review_text: The hotel is absolutely gorgeous. We booked the premium room with direct  pool access and it was paradise with our own little jacuzzi and terrasse. The room was beautiful with a great colonial style! Bed was super comfy, amazing bathtub, shower, Japanese toilet, decoration etc! Staff was extremely accommodating and nice! We loved the evening cocktails and canapÃ©s complementary every night: delicious! Breakfast was also super good! The welcome drink was superb  and original. hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Every staff member with whom we came in contact was attentive and kind when I took my family for my son birthday celebration. I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the excellent service & care we received at The Barracks Hotel from time to time.We had a wonderful staycation and I would definitely recommended this to all of my colleagues, friends and family. Thank you again for such outstanding service:-)

I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the excellent service & care we received at The Barracks Hotel from time to time.We had a wonderful staycation and I would definitely recommended this to all of my colleagues, friends and family. Thank you again for such outstanding service:-)

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: I stayed in many hotels in Sentosa and I dare say this is the Best hotel in Sentosa . Exclusive boutique hotel with world class service (even better than Capella ). Stayed here 3 times since its opening n absolutely love it .
review_text: I stayed in many hotels in Sentosa and I dare say this is the Best hotel in Sentosa . Exclusive boutique hotel with world class service (even better than Capella ). Stayed here 3 times since its opening n absolutely love it .

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Service was excellent and exceeded our expectation. We were served cocktails from 5-8pm and breakfast selection was great.  We asked for direction as we wanted to go for a walk - instead of just giving us the direction, Shah took the buggy and brought us to the foot of the hill , where the start of the walk should begin. Restaurants around the hotel were also amazing !  Def will be back !
review_text: Service was excellent and exceeded our expectation. We were served cocktails from 5-8pm and breakfast selection was great.  We asked for direction as we wanted to go for a walk - instead of just giving us the direction, Shah took the buggy and brought us to the foot of the hill , where the start of the walk should begin. Restaurants around the hotel were also amazing !  Def will be back !

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: It was a lovely 3-night staycation. My boy especially liked the island bathtub and the balcony overseeing the swimming pool. We loved the spread during breakfast and complimentary canapes and champagne before dinner. Best of all, the staff were very attentive and friendly. Would like to give a special shout out to Gavin who took good care of us, and drove us to other attractions at Sentosa on the hotel's awesome new Jeep. Wonderful memories at the Barracks and can't wait to return.
review_neg: nothing

We loved the spread during breakfast and complimentary canapes and champagne before dinner. Best of all, the staff were very attentive and friendly. Would like to give a special shout out to Gavin who took good care of us, and drove us to other attractions at Sentosa on the hotel's awesome new Jeep. Wonderful memories at the Barracks and can't wait to return. nothing

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Really enjoyed our staycation at the Barracks.  The service was outstanding, the staff went out of their way to ensure our every need met.  Our room by the pool was perfect for a relaxing holiday.  Having breakfast, snacks & drinks, and cocktail hour all included in the price made it a great value.  We also loved being able to have breakfast and dinner on the patio beside the pool.I would recommend this hotel for couples and families with older kids (teens).
review_text: Really enjoyed our staycation at the Barracks.  The service was outstanding, the staff went out of their way to ensure our every need met.  Our room by the pool was perfect for a relaxing holiday.  Having breakfast, snacks & drinks, and cocktail hour all included in the price made it a great value.  We also loved being able to have breakfast and dinner on the patio beside the pool.I would recommend this hotel for couples and families with older kids (teens).

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: It was one of the best hotels Iâ€™ve stayed! Clean, modern, great staff and service. Joel who welcomed us and took us the room was fantastic and Iâ€™d like to thank him again here for his professionalism & hospitality that made our first day very welcoming & pleasant! Definitely gave us a lot of confidence in the level of service and ambiance of the hotel.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The staff are absolutely amazing! Such a nice bunch. Really made the difference. The pool areas are great, not too many people and very relaxing. Place is very clean and professionally taken care of. It really exceeded our expectations.
review_neg: Nothing to add here!

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: The nostalgic feeling of the location as it was the very first navy barracks.
review_neg: The guest staying in the room next to me. There are certain ways to handle situations and not with vulgarities. And yet after reporting it, the management did nothing about it.
review_text: The nostalgic feeling of the location as it was the very first navy barracks. The guest staying in the room next to me. There are certain ways to handle situations and not with vulgarities. And yet after reporting it, the management did nothing about it.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: An awesome and fantabulous experience. We were greeted by Hafisz with a cold towel and welcome spritz drink at the reception while they process our check-in. Trisha explained the safe protocols and the bookings to adhere with the social distancing.Our room was available so we got lucky for early check-in. We availed the room with direct access to the pool. Itâ€™s amazing! Everything in the minibar except for the liquors were complimentary. Awesome! We had our own jacuzzi and we dip in anytime! Btw, they have all day complimentary drinks so around the clock refreshmentsI liked the coziness of the living room area where you can have your breakfast, hi tea and cocktail time. Thank you Gavin for explaining the signature 1904 tea and prepared a mocktail and warm tea for me to try. Well pampered! A thank you to Melvin for booking our afternoon hi tea and granted our request for a late check-out.Special thanks to Emily who always looked after us and our food making sure they were properly served. During our hi tea she prepared our personalised teas for that afternoon. Overly impressed!Thanks to Nuru for being so welcoming and friendly while serving our 2nd day breakfast! The yummy Nasi Lemak!Thank you to Jim the area manager for checking on us making sure we had a wonderful stay!Lastly to Hushali who listened to my feedback and gave a warm reassurance. Thank you much for the parting gift! Guess what? A box of 1904 tea! Awesome!In conclusion, if you are looking for exclusivity and privacy with amazing service and friendliness of everyone, come and book your stay at the Barracks Hotel!
review_neg: Very minor - i asked for spritz but one of the staff served me a sprite! ðŸ˜‚ still okay.

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Jim and gang were such a wonderful and attentive bunch. We always felt so well taken care of. The cocktails were really good. It was a shame that we could not cross over to Village/Outpost to use their facilities, perhaps in future. It was also very convenient that there were good restaurants (Quentin, HideMasa, Royal Taj) that we could easily walk to for dinner.
review_neg: - One of the jacuzzi buttons need to be pressed continuously for the bubbles to keep on going... :(  - Perhaps work out some collaboration with the restaurants nearby to offer discounts or special dishes for hotel guests or even for meals to be charged to the room?
review_text: Jim and gang were such a wonderful and attentive bunch. We always felt so well taken care of. The cocktails were really good. It was a shame that we could not cross over to Village/Outpost to use their facilities, perhaps in future. It was also very convenient that there were good restaurants (Quentin, HideMasa, Royal Taj) that we could easily walk to for dinner. - One of the jacuzzi buttons need to be pressed continuously for the bubbles to keep on going... :(  - Perhaps work out some collaboration with the restaurants nearby to offer discounts or special dishes for hotel guests or even for meals to be charged to the room?

hotelname: The Barracks Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
review_pos: Sentosaâ€™s best kept secret - a stylish new boutique hotel, in a quiet central location, with touches of excellence and luxury. The staff bent over backwards to provide a lovely birthday cake & song for my daughter and made sure we were well looked after throughout the stay. Loved the evening canapÃ©s and basking in our private jacuzzi!
